com.pizza.Controller

Class BestellungsList

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pizza.CMModel.DBConnect
      • com.pizza.Controller.BestellungsList

  • public class BestellungsList
extends DBConnect

    Controls the Bestellung and Items Models

    The BestellungList class controls the list of items, the quantity and the price of the order (or bestellung). Here are also the ordered items stored in the corresponding table in the database.

      • getBestellList

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> getBestellList()
        Returns:
        Map This is a Map representing the ordered list of items in the form of Map<PreisId, Menge>

      • setBestellList

        public void setBestellList(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> bestellList)
        Parameters:
        bestellungId - the bestellungId value to be set to the bestellung entry and the corresponding bestellung items

      • getBestellungId

        public java.lang.Integer getBestellungId()
        Returns:
        Integer This is the id of the order (or bestellung) from the bestellung table

      • setBestellungId

        public void setBestellungId(java.lang.Integer bestellungId)
        Parameters:
        bestellungId - the bestellungId value to be set to the bestellung entry and the corresponding bestellung items

      • getTotalPreis

        public java.lang.Double getTotalPreis()
        Returns:
        Double This is the total price (sum) of the whole order (or bestellung) in the form of Map<PreisId, Menge>

      • setTotalPreis

        public void setTotalPreis(java.lang.Double totalPreis)
        Parameters:
        totalPreis - the totalPreis value to be set to the bestellung entry

      • store

        public boolean store()
        Stores the ordered items in the Items table of the database
